content: this fun project is worked in one piece in seed stitch and then cleverly seamed together to create a unique carrying box stitched in our 100% cotton lily sugar n cream the pattern would be cute in any color you choose finished with a zipper closure all your contents will stay secure measuring 4 x 4 x 4 this knit box bag is perfect for holding notions a small project jewelry or anything else you can think of materials yarn needle zipper 9 23 cm long sewing needle and matching coats & clark® thread to sew zipper in position
